text: Often times we need to convert floating point images to corresponding binarize 0-1 image. It would just be fantastic to have a neat nilearn function to do this in various flavors.
title: Binarize image option for nilearn.image

text: I think I am missing the priority here. May be before this we need to address this circular importing error #835 ?
This is linked to #847, we should probably propose a set of tools for image manipulation.
